item.description:
Let's go check out to the new Olive Garden at the Loop in Methuen MA

Can't make the Festival of Trees in the afternoon? Want to have dinner with a few friends? Come on down to the Olive Garden and have dinner and drinks with us.

For those of you who have never been to Olive Garden, you are missing a great Italian restaurant Tuscany style. For those who have been to Olive Garden before you know the delicious choices.

Often times OG runs specials like the never ending pasta bowl or particular dishes from Italy.
So come on down to Methuen and join us for some Vino, Pasta and conversation.

We will attempt to make a call ahead seating but OG does not accept reservations. If we are unable to get a Call ahead, please be prepared to wait. If the wait is long we can walk around the stores of the Loop and pick up some more holiday gifts.


Hope to see you at the OG
item.name: Olive Garden at the loop
